name: Infinity Zombie Shooter
description:
In this game, You must defend against an endless series of waves of zombies. The game's unique "infinity Zombie Shooter" system ensures that the action never stops, as You must fight off wave after wave of increasingly difficult foes.

With a variety of weapons and power-ups at their disposal, You must use Your skills and strategy to survive for as long as possible. As You progress through the game, You will unlock new  weapons to help You  in Your  fight against the never-ending tide of Zombies.
